metadata.title: RZ/G2L: I want to evaluate an interface not available with an evaluation board.

sections.content:
Question:
There are interfaces that exist as functions in RZ/G2L devices, but not as interfaces in RZ/G2L Evaluation Board Kit. Is there any way to evaluate those interfaces?
Answer:
Various partner boards utilizing the RZ/G2L are available. Please see if you can find a board that meets your evaluation purposes from the following page. 
https://www.renesas.com/products/microcontrollers-microprocessors/rz-mpus/rz-partner-solutions#quick-link-2846
Suitable Products
RZ/G2L
There are interfaces that exist as functions in RZ/G2L devices, but not as interfaces in RZ/G2L Evaluation Board Kit. Is there any way to evaluate those interfaces?
